title: Floods and Fires Claim 11 Lives Over Christmas Holiday

(Photo by Brian CASSEY / AFP) (Photo by BRIAN CASSEY/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Canada’s Economy Had ‘Rare’ Economic Retraction in 2023 Despite Absence of Recession: Report
